rules_text:
Whenever this creature enters or attacks, creature tokens you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. You gain 1 life for each noncreature token you control.
When this creature dies, if it's not a token, create a token that's a copy of it.
flavor_text: [i]“I am the immortal will of the people. Who else could wear their joy, their madness so?” [/i]
